Class Boss

java.lang.Object
Enemy
Boss
public class Boss extends Enemy
The Boss class represents boss enemies players encounter in specific game areas. Each boss has unique characteristics and stats. It inherits from the Enemy class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Boss

      public Boss(Enemy.EnemyType type, int areaIndex)
      Constructs a Boss object with specified type and area index. Initializes boss attributes based on the area index.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the boss.
      areaIndex - The index of the area where the boss is spawned.

  • Method Details

    • spawnBoss

      public static Boss spawnBoss(int areaIndex)
      Spawns a boss specific to the area index.
      Parameters:
      areaIndex - The index of the area where the boss is spawned.
      Returns:
      A Boss object representing the spawned boss.
